description.value:
Filled with a green or putrid yellow haze, this sphere spreads a choking, foul-smelling mist when broken.

Effect: As a maneuver, you throw this delicate glass sphere up to 5 squares, breaking it and creating a 4 cube of fog. The fog dissipates after 10 minutes or if a strong gust of wind created by a storm or magic passes through the area.

Each creature who enters the cloud for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes [[/damage 5 poison]] damage. Additionally, any creature is weakened while in the fog.
